verses.text_plain: And Naomi had a kinsman of her husband’s, a mighty man of wealth, of the family of Elimelech; and his name was Boaz.
verses.verse_html:
1And Naomi had a kinsman of her husband’s, a mighty man of wealth, of the family of Elimelech; and his name was Boaz. ▼
▼ Boaz: Gr. Booz

verses.text_plain: And Ruth the Moabitess said unto Naomi, Let me now go to the field, and glean ears of corn after him in whose sight I shall find grace. And she said unto her, Go, my daughter.
verses.verse_html: 2And Ruth the Moabitess said unto Naomi, Let me now go to the field, and glean ears of corn after him in whose sight I shall find grace. And she said unto her, Go, my daughter.

verses.text_plain: And she went, and came, and gleaned in the field after the reapers: and her hap was to light on a part of the field belonging unto Boaz, who was of the kindred of Elimelech.
verses.verse_html:
3And she went, and came, and gleaned in the field after the reapers: and her hap was to light on a part of the field belonging unto Boaz, who was of the kindred of Elimelech. ▼
▼ hap…: Heb. hap happened

footnotes.body_html: ▼ hap…: Heb. hap happened

verses.text_plain: And, behold, Boaz came from Beth–lehem, and said unto the reapers, The Lord be with you. And they answered him, The Lord bless thee.
verses.verse_html: 4And, behold, Boaz came from Beth–lehem, and said unto the reapers, The Lord be with you. And they answered him, The Lord bless thee.

verses.text_plain: Then said Boaz unto his servant that was set over the reapers, Whose damsel is this?
verses.verse_html: 5Then said Boaz unto his servant that was set over the reapers, Whose damsel is this?

verses.text_plain: And the servant that was set over the reapers answered and said, It is the Moabitish damsel that came back with Naomi out of the country of Moab:
verses.verse_html: 6And the servant that was set over the reapers answered and said, It is the Moabitish damsel that came back with Naomi out of the country of Moab:

verses.text_plain: And she said, I pray you, let me glean and gather after the reapers among the sheaves: so she came, and hath continued even from the morning until now, that she tarried a little in the house.
verses.verse_html: 7And she said, I pray you, let me glean and gather after the reapers among the sheaves: so she came, and hath continued even from the morning until now, that she tarried a little in the house.

tokens.text: I pray you, let me glean

verses.text_plain: Then said Boaz unto Ruth, Hearest thou not, my daughter? Go not to glean in another field, neither go from hence, but abide here fast by my maidens:
verses.verse_html: 8Then said Boaz unto Ruth, Hearest thou not, my daughter? Go not to glean in another field, neither go from hence, but abide here fast by my maidens:

verses.text_plain: Let thine eyes be on the field that they do reap, and go thou after them: have I not charged the young men that they shall not touch thee? and when thou art athirst, go unto the vessels, and drink of that which the young men have drawn.
verses.verse_html: 9Let thine eyes be on the field that they do reap, and go thou after them: have I not charged the young men that they shall not touch thee? and when thou art athirst, go unto the vessels, and drink of that which the young men have drawn.

tokens.text: thee? and when thou art athirst

verses.text_plain: Then she fell on her face, and bowed herself to the ground, and said unto him, Why have I found grace in thine eyes, that thou shouldest take knowledge of me, seeing I am a stranger?
verses.verse_html: 10Then she fell on her face, and bowed herself to the ground, and said unto him, Why have I found grace in thine eyes, that thou shouldest take knowledge of me, seeing I am a stranger?

tokens.text: unto him, Why have I found

verses.text_plain: And Boaz answered and said unto her, It hath fully been shewed me, all that thou hast done unto thy mother in law since the death of thine husband: and how thou hast left thy father and thy mother, and the land of thy nativity, and art come unto a people which thou knewest not heretofore.
verses.verse_html: 11And Boaz answered and said unto her, It hath fully been shewed me, all that thou hast done unto thy mother in law since the death of thine husband: and how thou hast left thy father and thy mother, and the land of thy nativity, and art come unto a people which thou knewest not heretofore.

tokens.text: me, all that thou hast done

verses.text_plain: The Lord recompense thy work, and a full reward be given thee of the Lord God of Israel, under whose wings thou art come to trust.
verses.verse_html: 12The Lord recompense thy work, and a full reward be given thee of the Lord God of Israel, under whose wings thou art come to trust.

tokens.text: be given thee of the Lord

verses.text_plain: Then she said, Let me find favour in thy sight, my lord; for that thou hast comforted me, and for that thou hast spoken friendly unto thine handmaid, though I be not like unto one of thine handmaidens.
verses.verse_html:
13Then she said, Let me find favour in thy sight, my lord; for that thou hast comforted me, and for that thou hast spoken friendly unto thine handmaid, though I be not like unto one of thine handmaidens. ▼
▼ Let me…: or, I find
 , ▼
▼ friendly: Heb. to the heart

tokens.text: me, and for that thou hast spoken
though I be not like unto one

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Let me…: or, I find
▼ friendly: Heb. to the heart

verses.text_plain: And Boaz said unto her, At mealtime come thou hither, and eat of the bread, and dip thy morsel in the vinegar. And she sat beside the reapers: and he reached her parched corn, and she did eat, and was sufficed, and left.
verses.verse_html: 14And Boaz said unto her, At mealtime come thou hither, and eat of the bread, and dip thy morsel in the vinegar. And she sat beside the reapers: and he reached her parched corn, and she did eat, and was sufficed, and left.

verses.text_plain: And when she was risen up to glean, Boaz commanded his young men, saying, Let her glean even among the sheaves, and reproach her not:
verses.verse_html:
15And when she was risen up to glean, Boaz commanded his young men, saying, Let her glean even among the sheaves, and reproach her not: ▼
▼ reproach…: Heb. shame her not

tokens.text: And when she was risen up

footnotes.body_html: ▼ reproach…: Heb. shame her not

verses.text_plain: And let fall also some of the handfuls of purpose for her, and leave them, that she may glean them, and rebuke her not.
verses.verse_html: 16And let fall also some of the handfuls of purpose for her, and leave them, that she may glean them, and rebuke her not.

verses.text_plain: So she gleaned in the field until even, and beat out that she had gleaned: and it was about an ephah of barley.
verses.verse_html: 17So she gleaned in the field until even, and beat out that she had gleaned: and it was about an ephah of barley.

tokens.text: and it was about an ephah

verses.text_plain: And she took it up, and went into the city: and her mother in law saw what she had gleaned: and she brought forth, and gave to her that she had reserved after she was sufficed.
verses.verse_html: 18And she took it up, and went into the city: and her mother in law saw what she had gleaned: and she brought forth, and gave to her that she had reserved after she was sufficed.

tokens.text: to her that she had reserved

verses.text_plain: And her mother in law said unto her, Where hast thou gleaned to day? and where wroughtest thou? blessed be he that did take knowledge of thee. And she shewed her mother in law with whom she had wrought, and said, The man’s name with whom I wrought to day is Boaz.
verses.verse_html: 19And her mother in law said unto her, Where hast thou gleaned to day? and where wroughtest thou? blessed be he that did take knowledge of thee. And she shewed her mother in law with whom she had wrought, and said, The man’s name with whom I wrought to day is Boaz.

tokens.text: unto her, Where hast thou gleaned
be he that did take knowledge

verses.text_plain: And Naomi said unto her daughter in law, Blessed be he of the Lord, who hath not left off his kindness to the living and to the dead. And Naomi said unto her, The man is near of kin unto us, one of our next kinsmen.
verses.verse_html:
20And Naomi said unto her daughter in law, Blessed be he of the Lord, who hath not left off his kindness to the living and to the dead. And Naomi said unto her, The man is near of kin unto us, one of our next kinsmen. ▼
▼ one of…: or, one that hath right to redeem

tokens.text: unto us, one of our next kinsmen

footnotes.body_text: ▼ one of…: or, one that hath right to redeem
footnotes.body_html: ▼ one of…: or, one that hath right to redeem

verses.text_plain: And Ruth the Moabitess said, He said unto me also, Thou shalt keep fast by my young men, until they have ended all my harvest.
verses.verse_html: 21And Ruth the Moabitess said, He said unto me also, Thou shalt keep fast by my young men, until they have ended all my harvest.

tokens.text: unto me also, Thou shalt keep fast

verses.text_plain: And Naomi said unto Ruth her daughter in law, It is good, my daughter, that thou go out with his maidens, that they meet thee not in any other field.
verses.verse_html:
22And Naomi said unto Ruth her daughter in law, It is good, my daughter, that thou go out with his maidens, that they meet thee not in any other field. ▼
▼ meet…: or, fall upon thee

footnotes.body_html: ▼ meet…: or, fall upon thee

verses.text_plain: So she kept fast by the maidens of Boaz to glean unto the end of barley harvest and of wheat harvest; and dwelt with her mother in law.
verses.verse_html: 23So she kept fast by the maidens of Boaz to glean unto the end of barley harvest and of wheat harvest; and dwelt with her mother in law.
